data_table.description: This subject consent data table includes subjects IDs, consent information, T1D affection status, and mapping to subject aliases.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by T1DGC consortium
variable.value: Disease-Specific (Type 1 diabetes, its complications and other autoimmune diseases, IRB, RD) (DS-T1DR-IRB-RD)

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: T1D affection status of the subject
